comfortable.text-title: Are you satisfied with our service?
comfortable.text-feedback: Your feedback will be received by esm’s development team of SOFTBRAIN Co., Ltd and will be used to improve our service.
comfortable.text-contact1: If you have any question about how to use or want to report any issue, please click

Additional-feedback.placehoder:
Examples 
 • Calendar is easy to use 
 • I do not know what to do 
 • Timeline is displayed too slowly 
 • I have too enter too many items on the activity registration screen 
 • I want internal questionnaire function
